sentence.text: Addition of exogenous negative regulation of cell proliferation (6XHis-tagged, E. coli expressed and partially purified using Ni-ion columns) significantly suppressed the tumor necrosis factor-α (negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II-α)-stimulated human umbilical cord vascular endothelial cell (HUVEC) microtubule cytoskeleton organization formation.

entity.text: negative regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
